name: Assessment Examination
description:
Thanks for applying to the Authenticity Assessment Department.

We wish you luck on your upcoming examination!

You will need it.

Important:

- The credits (my name) should only appear at the very end. That was an error. And an embarrassing one at that.

- There's a section missing.

- I only had one day to make this, so I was in a rush. My apologies for the issues.

- An improved version will be uploaded as soon as the jam's voting period ends.

- The game was inspired by the Mandela Catalogue by Alex Kister.
